originalText.text: Horrible. Thought to give them a try because of their good reviews. Jokes on me! First they sent a plumber instead of a HVAC tech. Plumber was a great guy, not his fault and tried to help, but I HVAC! 8 hours later, HVAC shows up, to be told that they don’t have experience in wall-hung combi-boilers! Also not his fault, but after speaking with 3 dispatchers, customer service, and an HVAC manager, how the heck didn’t anyone realize what kind of boiler I had! And still have no hot water or heat! Would never recommend this unprofessional company!

originalText.text: I scheduled a 10am -1pm slot but the maintenance guy came at 3pm+. He dusted off our boiler but realized that pilot light got turned off. Took time to troubleshoot but not after I have to Google and gave him a hint that the boiler's pilot light could be triggered by thermostat. And the the most disappointing part, I was charged for $200 for the said tune-up! I subscribed to a maintenance plan with them but I was not made aware clearly of the tune-up cost. I'll look for another HVAC company next time.

originalText.text: Every time I've dealt with, Horizon Heating And Cooling Co, I've had a great experience. When I got my new heating/ cooling system put in they were very nice, professional and friendly. When I went into their building to pick up a filter they were nice and friendly and when I had to call to have someone come out to fix wires my dog chewed up they were nice and friendly! The secretary on the phone was very sweet and caring and got us in the next available spot to have our ac fixed. Then called a day early to tell us they could do it that day which was amazing! The tech that came was nice and friendly and efficient!

originalText.text: Horizon Heating And Cooling Company was recommended by my neighbor.  I needed to replace both units due to flooding.  I tried them and noticed their offer in terms of price and value was the best.  Phil and the team were on time, did great work and kept me informed along the way.  Even the city inspector complimented their work when he came to certify the installation.  I would highly recommend Horizon Heating And Cooling Co.

originalText.text: Ever since we moved into our house in 2016, we have been working with Horizon Heating And Cooling Company. Every trip has been flawless. They go above and beyond by being really kind and professional. Every visit is enjoyable. Fully recommended!
